price: E, com efeito, escolhemo-los com ciência, acima dos mundos.
arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqadi ikh'tarnāhum ʿalā ʿil'min ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
